name: Little Tree Software
tag_list: web, design, development, website, software, birmingham, coventry, website-design, web-development
overview:
Little Tree are a no nonsense website design agency based in Birmingham, West Midlands. They specialize in designing and building beautiful, functional websites.

Little Tree use their broad range of creative and technical skills to help you and your business build a successful presence on the internet; whether you require a simple brochure website or a full blown e-commerce solution.

Little Tree are a friendly, approachable, hard-working bunch who believe in clear, honest communications with all their clients.
